stages.title: Our Courses
stages.description: Want to improve? No matter your level, take part in one of our various courses, in iconic locations.

sejours.title: Our Stays
sejours.description: Because golf is all about passion and sharing. AP Golf offers you packaged golf trips. Progress, discovery, conviviality, comfort—discover all our trips.

competitions.title: Pro-Am
competitions.description: Enjoy a unique experience by sharing your course with a coach during a private competition, combining sport, prestige, and conviviality.

intro.main: Discover our selection of golf courses
intro.second: Golf courses in Chamonix, led by a high-performance expert coach. Whether you are a beginner, passionate amateur, or a player seeking excellence, these courses adapt to your level: discovery, nature immersion, or intensive improvement. Each session combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc.

bootCampAcademy.title: One Day Evian Academy
bootCampAcademy.description: Join us for a day of training and leave with exercises and work plans to practice on your own.

program.day4: 3pm - 6pm : Around the green (CR, CL, and SB)

dataExpertise.title: Data Expertise at Golf National
dataExpertise.description: Change your perspective on your conception of golf. Find your swing by attending a course at Golf National with all the latest technologies and the participation of Damien GUINARD, one of the best French data experts.

program.day1:
Day 1 : Find your swing
Morning: Force plate analysis with Damien. Explanation of your swing system. Work on tee shots and your long game in general.
Afternoon: Play the Aigle course.
program.day2:
Day 2 : Boot Camp
Morning: Focus on long game, data recording (Trackman or Flight Scope).
Afternoon: Focus on chip roll, pitch & run, and bunker shots.
program.day3:
Day 3 : Strategy
Morning: Putting.
Afternoon: Play the Aigle course.

evianImmersion.title: Major Competition Immersion at Evian
evianImmersion.description: Come perfect your game on the incredible facilities of the Evian Resort and play a major course.

program.day1:
Day 1 : Training at the academy
Morning: Technical work at the practice on the long game.
Afternoon: Training at the practice on the short game.
program.day2:
Day 2 : Situational training on the Lake course
Accompanied course and strategy on the Lake Course.
program.day3:
Day 3 : Situational training on the Champions course
Warm-up, putting.
Accompanied course and strategy on the Champions Course.

stageCustom.title: Custom Courses
stageCustom.description: Do you have a specific need? A precise goal? Our golf courses in Chamonix are designed to adapt to your level and expectations. Each course combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc. Supervised by a high-performance expert coach, these courses allow you to progress quickly while enjoying a unique natural environment. Contact us to learn more.
stageCustom.descriptionMobile: Golf courses in Chamonix, supervised by a high-performance expert coach. Whether you are a beginner, passionate amateur, or a player seeking excellence, these courses adapt to your level: discovery, nature immersion, or intensive improvement. Each session combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc.

sejourCustom.title: Custom Stays
sejourCustom.description: Do you have a specific need? A precise goal? Our golf stays are designed to adapt to your level and expectations. Each stay combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in exceptional settings. Supervised by a high-performance expert coach, these stays allow you to progress quickly while enjoying unique natural environments. Contact us to learn more.
sejourCustom.descriptionMobile: Golf stays, supervised by a high-performance expert coach. Whether you are a beginner, passionate amateur, or a player seeking excellence, these stays adapt to your level: discovery, nature immersion, or intensive improvement. Each session combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in exceptional settings.

proAmCustom.title: Challenge yourself
proAmCustom.description: You want to prove your skills on a real competition with real pros ? We can partner to make it happen. If you have a specific event in mind, let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.
proAmCustom.descriptionMobile: Prove your skills on a real competition with real pros. We can partner to make it happen. If you have a specific event in mind, let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

presentation.title: The Coach
presentation.description: Qualified professional, I teach golf with passion and rigor. Former coach of the French military ski team, I possess a unique expertise in coaching up to high performance. My teaching methodology is based on a personalized, technical, and mental approach, tailored to all levels of play. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, I will accompany you in your progress with kindness, precision, and efficiency.

infoPratique.title: Practical Information
infoPratique.sendMailOrCall: Send us an email or call us at:

coachHome.title: The Coach
coachHome.description: Pierre ASCEDU, a certified professional for over 30 years, teaches golf at the Chamonix Golf Club with passion and precision. A former coach of the French military ski team, he has unique expertise in high-performance coaching. His teaching is based on a personalized, technical, and mental approach, adapted to all levels of play. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, he guides you in your progress with accuracy, care, and efficiency. Using modern tools (Trackman, AimPoint, TPI) and extensive field experience, Pierre helps you achieve your goals, whether for leisure or competition.

swingHouse.title: Our partner
swingHouse.description: Swing House is a dedicated space for golfers to refine their skills and enjoy a unique experience. Equipped with state-of-the-art technology and a welcoming atmosphere, it is the perfect place to practice, learn, and connect with fellow golf enthusiasts.

intro.second: Experience golf more intensely with our stays, suitable for all levels. Discover all our options!

montBlancExperience.title: Mont Blanc Experience
montBlancExperience.description: These 3-day courses take place around Chamonix. The core itinerary is Chamonix-Mont-Blanc, Courmayeur (Italy), and Evian. However, variations with the golf courses of Megève Mont d’Arbois, Biella (Italy), Esery, or Crans Montana (Switzerland) are possible.

program.day1:
Day 1: Chamonix Golf and VIP Swing House Evening
8:30am: Meet at Chamonix Golf, program presentation over coffee.
9:00am - 10:00am: Warm-up
10:00am - 3:00pm: 18-hole course, real-time coaching.
3:00pm - 4:00pm: Stress management debrief.
8:00pm - 10:00pm: VIP Swing House evening, technical recovery, video analysis, and practice with Trackman.
program.day2:
Day 2: Courmayeur Golf - Grandes Jorasses (Italy)
8:00am: Departure from Chamonix.
9:00am - 10:00am: Warm-up and technical recap from the previous day.
10:30am - 12:30pm: 9-hole course, real-time coaching.
12:30pm - 2:00pm: Lunch, tactical advice, tactical reasoning method.
2:00pm - 5:00pm: 9-hole course, real-time coaching.
Return to Chamonix, free evening.
program.day3:
Day 3: Evian Golf
8:45am: Meet at the Evian academy.
9:00am - 10:00am: Technical training (Trackman / Top Tracer) and club calibration.
12:30pm - 5:00pm: 18-hole course at Evian Champions Course, real-time coaching.

royalPark.title: Royal Park I Roveri
royalPark.description: Dolce Vita on the agenda. This 3-day course takes place in the magnificent setting of La Mandria Natural Park, at the foot of the Alps. Royal Park I Roveri is one of Italy’s most prestigious clubs, host to several international events including the Italian Open and European Amateur Championship. The golf course offers members, their guests, and tourists a unique opportunity to play on two courses designed by world-renowned architects.

program.day1:
Day 1: Green Attack
9:00am - 12:00pm: Practice improvement on green attacks.
2:00pm - 6:00pm: Old Trent Jones course.
program.day2:
Day 2: Putting Focus
9:00am - 12:00pm: Putting focus at the Royal Park I Roveri practice.
2:00pm - 6:00pm: Trent Jones course.

skiGolf.title: Ski & Golf
skiGolf.description: These 3-day courses take place around Chamonix. Experience an incredible and rare adventure in France. Alpine or touring skiing in the morning and golf in the afternoon. We accompany you on the slopes as well as on the course.

program.day1:
Day 1:
Morning: Skiing at Grands Montets.
Afternoon: Trent Jones course at Chamonix Golf.
program.day2:
Day 2:
Morning: Skiing at Grands Montets.
Afternoon: Trent Jones course at Chamonix Golf.
program.day3:
Day 3:
Morning: Skiing at Grands Montets.
Afternoon: Trent Jones course at Chamonix Golf.

additionalInfo.price: From €750 excluding ski pass and equipment

villaCarolina.title: Dolce Vita at Villa Carolina Resort
villaCarolina.description: Dolce Vita on the agenda. This 5-day course takes place at the Villa Carolina Golf Club Resort, immersed in the beautiful landscape of the Ovada hills. The two private 18-hole courses guarantee unique playing and training experiences for this course.

program.day1:
Day 1: Tee Shots
9:00am - 12:00pm: Practice improvement on tee shots.
2:00pm - 6:00pm: La Marchesa course.
program.day2:
Day 2: Green Attack
9:00am - 12:00pm: Practice improvement on green attacks.
2:00pm - 6:00pm: La Marchesa course.
program.day4:
Day 4: Bunker Shots Focus
9:00am - 12:00pm: Practice improvement on bunker shots.
2:00pm - 6:00pm: La Marchesa course.
